cktsbozyh45642map14gb8xrqh.title: Support Korean trade requests
cktsbozyh45642map14gb8xrqh.body: Currently messages from Korean players are not logged because of privacy laws. Given the trade helper relies on the game log, no trade requests are displayed.

cktsbp06645781map1mdgomfb5.title: Inventory value calculator
cktsbp06645781map1mdgomfb5.body: Image and text recognition AI to calculate inventory value using ImageAI and OCR. Similar to what HarvestVendor does but next level ðŸ¤“

cktzhzt3b156203yn1y63r2t1n.title: Discord Integration
cktzhzt3b156203yn1y63r2t1n.body:
- Send a message for every incoming trade to a dedicated Discord channel in order to get mobile notifications
- Send a message on progression updates (lvl up, first time reaching a zone) to another Discord channel to compete with friends.

cktsbozxk45626map1kyf25qky.title: Add hotkeys to the trade module
cktsbozxk45626map1kyf25qky.body: As a user i'd like to be able to trade using hotkeys in order to spent less time in my hideout.

cktsbp2gc47486map1eaofe0r5.title: [Smart search] Connecting the market/evaluate/inspect features
cktsbp2gc47486map1eaofe0r5.body: A way to open an inspected/evaluated item into the built-in market without having to manually enter stats or anything.

cktsbp2ec47445map10tmzn5tg.title: Evaluating item mods based on tiers
cktsbp2ec47445map10tmzn5tg.body: A feature where once enabled, you would price your item based on the tier it has (lowest roll for the tier) and not the exact value it has.

cktsbp2dw47436map1pyfne5ul.title: Evaluate feature to use the bulk exchange for currencies
cktsbp2dw47436map1pyfne5ul.body:
When it comes to currencies, using the "bulk item exchange"
instead of the "listed item search" would make much more sense. Especially for currencies that sells in very large amount.

cktsbp2dg47427map1h5dtrqzc.title: Stackable usernames when evaluating currencies
cktsbp2dg47427map1h5dtrqzc.body: I think the tool used to have that feature built in. I would love to see it come back. That feature used to help me spot price fixers.

cktsboyte44790map16wgfsqii.title: Stat groups support within market
cktsboyte44790map16wgfsqii.body: Being able to choose wich stat group we want to use instead of the default "and" one would be nice!

ckulbqcuc695573yqoybnb4lz3.title: Main UI not to launch on startup
ckulbqcuc695573yqoybnb4lz3.body: Some users prefer not having the main UI window show up on startup. Since this is a free tool ad driven, I could see this as a paid feature.

cku5nv9ol1711583yn11wkz9kjc.title: Make the software open source again
cku5nv9ol1711583yn11wkz9kjc.body: Please make it open source again

cktsbp2fx47477map1602cke1k.title: Party member highlight when trading
cktsbp2fx47477map1602cke1k.body: Through the trade feature, could it be possible to highlight the party member you have to trade with once you're in the same party? This would help quickly figure out which player you need to join its hideout. This would really help with non-greek alphabet names or vice-versa.

cktsbp2fj47469map1iqn119gj.title: Player ignore built-in feature
cktsbp2fj47469map1iqn119gj.body: I would love to see my player ignore list be linked from the official website. Could also be a totaly independant one if it's simpler to implement. Being able to directly add players to that list from the evaluate or market feature would be awsome.

cktsbp2f547461map1rrkovz8d.title: Programable timer on active trades
cktsbp2f547461map1rrkovz8d.body: Some timer that could be set to a fixed amount and where active trades in the trade module would auto clear when that timer ends.

cktsbp2er47453map15eb3o7us.title: In-game window for live searches
cktsbp2er47453map15eb3o7us.body: Something similar to the trade feature window but for live searches. This would be helpfull to players having a single monitor setup.

cktsbp27v47312map1uhmz4eoq.title: Trade window transparency slider
cktsbp27v47312map1uhmz4eoq.body: Would give the player freedom surrounding the appearence of the trade module window. Could also be expended to every different modules and windows. One slider per feature.

cktsbozyw45650map1jwscy7yj.title: Support for higher resolution screens
cktsbozyw45650map1jwscy7yj.body: The in-game windows are way too small on higher resolution screens. Add a way to increase the size of the windows and their content.

ckulldv18729933yqo0whohe6d.title: Need an option to sort items by their properties or stats when using evaluate
ckulldv18729933yqo0whohe6d.body: A new useful addition to the tool would be if you could sort evaluated items not by just price by default but clicking on its stats like dps or resists for example and sorting them from top to bottom that way to get more specific results

ckullawbd724633yqomf1rozi0.title: Sort items by their properties during evaluation
ckullawbd724633yqomf1rozi0.body: A real useful function to this tool would be if you could sort the item you're evaluating not just by the default setting - price, but like for example, clicking on the items property or its stat and getting them sorted from top to bottom in that way.

cku5nqszp1699763yn1wycz3zs5.title: Please make the software open source again
cku5nqszp1699763yn1wycz3zs5.body: Hello, please make the software open source again. Would be very much appreciated.
